ai-patthana7.21:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles consisting in thoughts.
ai-patthana7.21:1.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the sake of oneself that arises with an individual essence.
ai-patthana7.21:1.1_1: One does not give rise to the teaching on account of internal objects.
ai-patthana7.21:2.1_0: and does not give rise to the base consisting of psychic power. Contact is a condition for the sake of purification.
ai-patthana7.21:2.1_1: Not by crowding the mind does not arise there. Intentional states there is no cause or condition.
ai-patthana7.21:2.1_2: This is the section in brief.
